lead_paragraph: Athletes will have a voice in the bid by Los Angeles to win the 2024 Olympics and host the games a third time.

headline.main: LA Bidders Want to Give Athletes a Voice in Bid to Win Games
headline.print_headline: LA Bidders Want to Give Athletes a Voice in Bid to Win Games

snippet: Athletes will have a voice in the bid by Los Angeles to win the 2024 Olympics and host the games a third time....
